name: Moderate Retribution
overview: Moderate Retribution is a side scrolling shooter for the ZX Spectrum. It was developed by Dave Hughes and Mr. Thomas and published into the public domain by Stonechat Productions in 2013. This game was authored with Jonathan Cauldwell's Shoot 'Em Up Designer (S.E.U.D). The developer hacked the game with some of my own asm code to give extra colours (with Jonathan's permission), a front end, music (by Dr Thomas using Beepola). The define keys routine is adapted from the one in the S.E.U.D designer.
